cab.content: cThr, Document is th^t P^^SL^SLii- n^inn" r. 11 KvTrV 3 I jOVOi Ha v^HU57Military Secret.1341From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of State for India,mil March 1920.(Received 30th.)4017. On 19th March three trains left Askabacl with Austrian prisoners of war who have served in Bolshevik ranks, and another train was to leave on the 20th. These Austrians are believed to be en route for embarkation for repatriation to Austria, where Bolsheviks hope they will spread the Communist doctrines.
